name: Before Time
description:
Help caveman to gather food for his angry hungry wife.
Work your way through before time when the world was a dangerous place.
Move stone rocks to help you jump to higher ledges.
Find magic potion to create an earthquake to move obstacles blocking your way.
Look out for jumping mushrooms, they can help get to higher places, and they can also just get in the way too.
Attack dinosaurs by throwing rocks at them, look out for pterodactyls swooping.
Avoid dinosaur teeth, fiery lava spitting pits,
Ride the prehistoric skateboard.
Gather food to earn points.
Random endless levels
Compete with friends on the leaderboard, to see who is the best at gathering food.
